trans-unit.source: In Android Studio, press Run => Run app to deploy the changes to your Android device and run the app.
trans-unit.target: In Android Studio, press Run => Run app to deploy the changes to your Android device and run the app.

trans-unit.source: Log in with your identity provider and verify that authentication succeeds.
trans-unit.target: Log in with your identity provider and verify that authentication succeeds.

trans-unit.source: In the app, type text in Insert a TodoItem, and then click Save.
trans-unit.target: In the app, type text in Insert a TodoItem, and then click Save.

trans-unit.source: Note that after the insert completes, the app receives a push notification from GCM.
trans-unit.target: Note that after the insert completes, the app receives a push notification from GCM.

trans-unit.source: (Optional) Repeat steps 1-3 on a different client device and using a different account when logging in.
trans-unit.target: (Optional) Repeat steps 1-3 on a different client device and using a different account when logging in.

trans-unit.source: Verify that the notification is received only by devices authenticating with the same user account.
trans-unit.target: Verify that the notification is received only by devices authenticating with the same user account.
